title: 2000 Dutch TT
text:
The 2000 Dutch TT was the eighth round of the <a href="2000%20Grand%20Prix%20motorcycle%20racing%20season">2000 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season</a>. It took place on 24 June 2000 at the <a href="TT%20Circuit%20Assen">TT Circuit Assen</a> located in <a href="Assen">Assen</a>, <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a>.
Championship standings after the race (500cc).
Below are the standings for the top five riders and constructors after round eight has concluded.
